body:
Comment 9: 
If you use -make=false flag like:

goinstall -make=false github.com/hoisie/web.go

it would work now. Except github.com/hoisie/web.go is out of date and doesn't build any
more.

I think goinstall works now. I'll close the issue unless you have any objections.
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
